001package imagingbook.pub.sift.util;
002
003import java.awt.geom.Path2D;
004
005import ij.gui.Roi;
006import ij.gui.ShapeRoi;
007import imagingbook.lib.ij.CustomOverlay;
008import imagingbook.pub.sift.SiftDescriptor;
009
010/**
011 * Custom ImageJ overlay for drawing SIFT descriptors as
012 * "M"-shaped markers.
013 * @author WB
014 * @version 2020/10/04
015 */
016public class SiftOverlay extends CustomOverlay<SiftDescriptor> {
017        
018        private final static double DisplayAngleOffset = -Math.PI / 2;
019        private double featureScale = 1.0; // 1.5;
020        
021        public void setFeatureScale(double featureScale) {
022                this.featureScale = featureScale;
023        }
024        
025        @Override
026        public Roi makeRoi(SiftDescriptor sd) {
027                double x = sd.getX(); 
028                double y = sd.getY();
029                double scale = featureScale * sd.getScale();
030                double orient = sd.getOrientation() + DisplayAngleOffset;
031                double sin = Math.sin(orient);
032                double cos = Math.cos(orient);
033                Path2D poly = new Path2D.Double();      
034                poly.moveTo(x + (sin - cos) * scale, y - (sin + cos) * scale);
035                poly.lineTo(x + (sin + cos) * scale, y + (sin - cos) * scale);
036                poly.lineTo(x, y);
037                poly.lineTo(x - (sin - cos) * scale, y + (sin + cos) * scale);
038                poly.lineTo(x - (sin + cos) * scale, y - (sin - cos) * scale);
039                poly.closePath();
040                return new ShapeRoi(poly);
041        }
042
043}
